description:
After a dramatic loss at one of http://anidb.net/ch17597 [Rikiei]`s gambling establishments, Daigorou is pressured to give up either the deed to his business or his daughter, http://anidb.net/ch17897 [Osuzu], in order to cover his debt. He pleads with http://anidb.net/ch17599 [Kawara Heitarou] for help, suggesting that Rikiei`s establishments practice dishonesty. Kawara refuses, citing a lack of evidence. Daigoro has no choice but to give up his store, but http://anidb.net/ch17598 [Ishimatsu] takes Osuzu as well after http://anidb.net/ch17896 [Sosuke] tries to intervene.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Daigorou
